title: The error in ‘Application - Part Segmentation’
body:
My environment is ubuntu16.04，cuda9.2，cudnn7.6.4,pytorch1.1.0,faiss and visdom installed.
![cuda版本](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28673175/88750464-300ae800-d188-11ea-9ff5-f1d7944bd633.png)
![pytorch版本](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28673175/88750486-37ca8c80-d188-11ea-8a2d-09b935261072.png)
![faiss和visdom](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28673175/88750550-5a5ca580-d188-11ea-8abe-2c15e33ec76e.png)

I used the shapenet dataset in your Google Drive.Its location is '/media/rmv/data1/CPR/shapenetcore_partanno_segmentation_benchmark_v0_normal/',and I changed the 'dataroot' in the opinion of part-seg folder.
![文件地址](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28673175/88750860-01414180-d189-11ea-9d3c-1653e36b0f73.png)
![修改opinion](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28673175/88750869-04d4c880-d189-11ea-8c33-9e9cf29a3b01.png)

Then I compiled customized cuda code.The process is showed below.
![install之前](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28673175/88751045-64cb6f00-d189-11ea-8ac9-7928d54172f3.png)
![build之后](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28673175/88751047-672dc900-d189-11ea-8067-a8693b6f1717.png)
![bulid之后的文件夹](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28673175/88751073-73198b00-d189-11ea-95eb-f5e65908af7c.png)

Then I began the training,but I found the error''No module named 'util'''.To slove this,I add the 'SO-Net-master' folder path to the python path.
![发现没有util](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28673175/88751319-e6bb9800-d189-11ea-8507-6d5fe97c37ab.png)
![添加python路径](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28673175/88751324-e9b68880-d189-11ea-9596-61a598e27093.png)

At last it showd the error in the error.txt below,and I cannot figure out how to solve it.
![报错](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28673175/88751581-78c3a080-d18a-11ea-8b2b-637a88a7752d.png)
[error.txt](https://github.com/lijx10/SO-Net/files/4992265/error.txt)
